TopicTitle: Design Livery for the Down Under Space Plane!

Articles.Content:
A fleet of space planes is being built at Down Under HQ (a secret base under the ocean).

Clearly, each one of those planes needs a unique name and stylish pattern.

My challenge to you: fire up your favourite image editing program and design the most stylish pattern you can!

Don\'t forget to give your pattern a cool name, like Enterprise or Discovery.

Here is the submission template:

Here is an example pattern:

This pattern uses the official Down Under colour: 0x990000

And here is the ship that will sport your pattern:
Kinda looks like Vanguard
With a little experience with retexturing, Imma go give it a try
Nebula. :3
Concord.

Nebula. :3

may I edit this?

don\'t know if this might be what you\'re looking for, it\'s my first shot, but I rather like it. I tried to give it it\'s Aussie Heritage to!

PD
That ship looks like a bulky Vanguard...still, it looks very cool. Will there be a nosecone for it?



may I edit this?

Sure.

don\'t know if this might be what you\'re looking for, it\'s my first shot, but I rather like it. I tried to give it it\'s Aussie Heritage to!

PD

Looks good. Though you weren\'t meant to fill in the rectangles.

There are two kinds of defined shapes on the template;

There are grey-filled rectangles and open rectangles and circles

Which are the transparencies limits please, the open or filled rectangles?

I\'m assuming that the circles are locators for logos?

8)

Sorry, I should have labelled everything.

The rectangle at the top is the ship name.

The two rectangles at the bottom are the vertical stabilisers.

Squares, circles and rectangles on the left and right are the logos.

Grey rectangles represent black surface tiles.

Aurora

I took the liberty to mirror the decals\' position. I hope that\'s not a problem.

Beautiful right in the 3 pic\'s

Paint.NET.

I would say \'pwned\' but then some sucker would probably try telling me that Photoshop [something they\'d have had a pay for] was better.

Since Thursday was the day of national celbration (You Americans, think '4th of July', right?) here\'s my offering, Slew.

;D

I thought I\'d take some inspiration from the recent QANTAS livery selections.

The background art is by Clarrie Cox 'Police Station-Anthony Ceek'

I kept the black heat shield tiles and added sponsorhip logos and a tribute to the current world MotoGP champion.

The ship is named 'Boomer'

While I am not very good at texturing, I would like to submit a name for anyone to use:

Sapphire Storm
Do they need to be .gifs?

Do they need to be .gifs?

Submissions can be in any format.

This seems to have going quiet... Still want more submissions? I never did get around to my 'take 2'

PD

This seems to have going quiet... Still want more submissions? I never did get around to my 'take 2'

I was preoccupied with the release of Down Under 0.4.

The textures from this thread will be included in an 'Ausplane HD Texture Pack', to be released soon.

In the meantime, you\'re quite welcome to enter more submissions.

The texture pack with designs by Luigibro606, RedDwarfIV, PD, Rico88 and Tomokatu is now released.

Ausplane HD Textures (12.3MB)
